title: Reimburse 2800 Burned BTRST Tokens
body:
About a month ago I burned $100000 worth of BTRST tokens (2,810.59 BTRST Tokens) by sending them to the BTRST Contract instead of another wallet address.

You can see them sitting here in the contract address: https://etherscan.io/token/0x799ebfabe77a6e34311eeee9825190b9ece32824?a=0x799ebfabe77a6e34311eeee9825190b9ece32824

I spoke with the team who said they are unrecoverable, and suggested they might be reimbursed by the treasury and to put forth a proposal. Given that the token value has fallen considerable during the last month, I'm not asking for "full reimbursement" but rather just the current number of tokens that were burned.

There are a number of examples of other communities that have reimbursed users in similar instances in the past. I think this is a great opportunity for Braintrust to step up and help a community member. 

Please let me know if you have any feedback or if you have any other suggestions for reimbursement.

Thank you
author: 0xA335ADE338308B8e071Cf2c8F3cA5e50F6563C60
